titleStmt.title: The principles and practices of certain moderate divines of the Church of England (greatly mis-understood), truly represented and defended wherein ... some controversies, of no mean importance, are succinctly discussed : in a free discourse between two intimate friends : in three parts.
titleStmt.author: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Fowler. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
